Acid-Spewer Dragon
5B
Creature - Dragon
U

Flying, deathtouch

Megamorph 5BB (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for 3. Turn it face up at any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

When Acid-Spewer Dragon is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Dragon creature you control.
